title: Squishies who build no resistances whatsoever, yet still complain
body:
It baffles me how so much people can even have the audacity to complain about a late game one-shot either from an assassin/burst mage when they had no resistances to speak of. Like mages and assassins themselves are expected to build a bit tanky to survive against each other, how can you possibly think you're somehow an exception to this this? And this is like come strange community mind set because I once saw a thread that was upvoted to hell about Anivia's "unfair damage" on an Ashe. I looked at her stats, she had 51 MR, at late game. Yeah, unfair my ass, there was even someone in the comments who was like "Aum, there was like, an aegis there." Oh boy, that +15 MR on a base 36 MR is definitely going to save me from the fed late game mage. Seriously, it's like people expect to just build full glass and not be just that, glass. Maybe if you took the time to build appropriately and respect and enemy's damage, you wouldn't find yourself constantly dying in a virtual fire like some pleb.

EDIT: Now just for clarification, while I did say resistances, I still mean defensive items in general. It could pseudo resistance like {{item:3812}} or just a whatever offensive stat+HP item like {{item:3027}}.

I'm talking items not masteries.

That mastery deficiency has a multiplicative effect on the gap between defensive and offensive itemization, particularly because a lot of the offense masteries are % while defensive ones are flat, and low values to boot. Tanks have pretty much worse masteries, worse items, and, so often, odd build paths as you have to dynamically switch between which defensive stat to prioritize. Honestly, any tank that legitimately gets ahead in his own proper skill bracket deserves a good word from his team right now.

Tanks will steamroll you if you don't have at least one resistance item (ok not steamroll, but they'll hurt). 

Seriously, buy some resistance people. At some point you have enough damage.

You know, I've yet to see this actually happen in game, Tanks pretty much win games in my experience.
You forgot to mention how they will then start to complain that the enemy plays a ''nub champ with no counterplay''.

Simple: ADCs got spoiled.

After all almost all 5 seasons we had Riot busy buffing ADCs and nerfing whoever was close to taking their spotlight...

While i agree with this logic, Anivia was complained about cuz she has 3 instantaneous point and click abilities which empower each other and regardless of the champions, at this meta, late game resistances don't mean shit on Adcs and Mid laners cuz they have to make mostly damage anyway.

Yes late game the actual resistances on anyone but a tank/fighter might have little meaning, but the passive/active effects you get from building defensive items are what you really want at that point.

Well that's the intended weakness of ADCs, and I would prefer they continue to not build any defenses outside of GA. It wouldn't be fair late game for ADC's to have all the range, siege, DPS, and still survive if you get on them.

Oh I don't want that either, but when you see these countless cry threads about damage that Riot continuously panders to, it gets pretty frustrating when you know that these people despite the countless defensive options never even give them a thought.
